text: Annarita Sidoti (25 July 1970 - 21 May 2015) was an Italian race walker. She was the 1997 world champion. She also won the European Championships twice and the European Indoor Championships once. She competed in the 1992, 1996 and 2000 Summer Olympics. She appeared in the 1998 movie Le complici. Sidoti was born in Gioiosa Marea, Sicily. She was married and had three children. Sidoti died from breast cancer on 21 May 2015 in Gioiosa Marea. She was 44. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:2015 deaths Category:1992 Summer Olympics Category:1996 Summer Olympics Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Italian athletes Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Sicily
title: Annarita Sidoti
